issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Read feather 1.0 files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7586](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7586). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7586?focusedCommentId=17019221) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I think this is probably not needed for 0.16.0

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7586?focusedCommentId=17200866) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
We could also simply close this issue? Or would we still like to add it at some point? 
(users can always use the plain file reader to read the legacy files)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7586?focusedCommentId=17565769) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
